title: Simple Living, But Make It Frugal!
itunes:title: Simple Living, But Make It Frugal!
description:
What exactly is simple living, and how might it benefit our lives? When it comes to frugality, saving money and cutting expenses; simplicity has a lot to teach us! Let's talk about what it looks like to live simply and some tangible steps to get us there!

Get full show notes here!

  • https://www.frugalfriendspodcast.com/freeGet our FREE 7-Day No-Spend Challenge Workbook here!
  • https://www.frugalfriendspodcast.com/club-bff-waitlist/Join the waitlist for Club BFF:
  • https://www.youtube.com/frugalfriendsSubscribe for more on YouTube:
  • https://www.instagram.com/frugalfriendspodcast/Hang out with us on Instagram!
